concept.title: AFMC PGI 5301.9001-93 Clearance Documentation

conbody.p: Files submitted for clearance review should include, at a minimum, the following documentation. The list below is not totally inclusive.

li.p:
(a) Business Clearance for competitive acquisitions requesting approval to issue the solicitation:
(1) Solicitation (and all amendments, if applicable) in chronological order
(2) Acquisition Plan (or other Acquisition Planning Documentation)/Acquisition Strategy (as applicable)
(3) J&A (if for limited sources)
(4) Source Selection Plan (if applicable)
(5) Other applicable file items of the Contract File Content Checklist (e.g., Purchase Request, determinations, synopses, Award Fee/Incentive Plan, and if services, required documentation and Services Designated Official (SDO) approvals, and SSA briefing charts if available)
(6) Clearance briefing charts (if required by the CAA).
